text: Ia gumazitamɨn gantɨ a uan akatam o arazir an amitamɨn ia gifaran markɨ. Ia oragh! Dughiar kam puram otoghan kogham. Puvatɨ. Faragh gumazir avɨrim Godɨn akaba batoghɨva egh akɨrim God gasaragham. Eghtɨ Godɨn araziba adoghadozir gumazir mam azenara otogham, gumazir kam God helɨn a gasɨghasɨgham.
